name: Snow Ball Jump
description:
Snow Ball Jump is a challenging game, with simple tap to play.
Snow Ball Jump requires timing and skill, Its easy to learn but hard to master.
Tap to jump, Hold to jump further, Perfect your jumps to top the leader board.
Jump the snow ball from rocks and snowman, Try to land in the centre as its slippery and you will slide off.
Perfect your jumps, Avoid orange spikes, and blue icy snow.
Challenge your friends and the world on the leaderboard.
Have a great and safe Christmas.
